name: Betrothed
description:
So there's this guy. He's smart, sweet, romantic, and sexy as hell. I've had my eye on him for a while now, but only recently worked up the nerve to ask him out.

Okay, that's not the only reason I haven't made any grand gestures.

I'm also betrothed to the Devil

This is my very first game, and I loved making it (even if I was yelling at the computer screen because the code wouldn't execute properly). So, enjoy this rather short sort-of-but-not-quite dating sim with multiple endings, and if you like it, please donate so that I can make more free or cheap weird but meaningful games.

Feel free to follow me on twitter at @athenahollow for random posts, lots of swearing & yelling at the manosphere, and updates on my upcoming games!
